description: I. Keeping our school safe : review of safeguarding arrangements in independent schools, non-maintained special schools and boarding schools in England. 75 p. II. Letter dated 24/03/2009 from Ed Balls MP to Roger Singleton, Independent Safeguarding Authority, regarding child safety arrangements in independent, boarding, and non-maintained special schools. 4 p.
department: Dept for Children, Schools and Families Independent Safeguarding Authority
